spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.

Taking damage has a chance to call your Personal Absorb-o-Tron, absorbing 50% of damage taken over 20 sec, up to 974.

Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 30.

Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you 25 applications of Overwhelming Power. Each stack of Overwhelming Power grants 2 Haste. An application of Overwhelming Power is removed every 1 sec or whenever you take damage.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to grow or shrink the world. Shrinking the world grants you 28 primary stat and 694 maximum health for 10 sec. Growing the world grants you 99 Haste and 25% movement speed for 10 sec.

Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 25.
Dark Transformations ignites you and your pet with flaming chains that deal 32 Fire damage every sec to enemies between you for 15 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 20.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crown of Eternal Winter

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Your spells and abilities have a chance to summon 2 Army of the Dead ghouls for 19 sec.

When the Vision of Perfection activates, you and up to 2 other nearby allies gain 4 Haste for 10 sec.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Reduces the cooldown of Apocalypse by 10.0%, and increases your Versatility by 3.

When you activate Apocalypse, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target for 115 Fire damage, and heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

If your target is below 20% health, the chance for extra damage is increased by 400%.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Runes spent on them, heal you for 114, and increase your Versatility by 13 for 8 sec.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Versatility by 1 for 14 sec, stacking up to 8 times. Being the vicitim of a loss of control or movement impairing effect also grants a stack of Strife.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

(4) Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 1.2 million Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)
